content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to real-time information or the ability to provide real-time updates. However, I can provide you with some recent crime statistics for Atlantic City as reported by the FBI. According to the FBI's 2019 Uniform Crime Report, Atlantic City had a total of 2,232 reported crimes, which includes 13 homicides, 259 robberies, and 759 cases of larceny/theft. Keep in mind that these statistics are from 2019, and crime rates can fluctuate from year to year. For the most current and accurate crime statistics, it is best to check with local officials or law enforcement agencies.
